text: CBS Radio was a radio broadcasting company and radio network operator. It was owned by CBS Corporation and founded in 1928, with consolidated radio station groups owned by CBS and Westinghouse Broadcasting/Group W since the 1920s, and Infinity Broadcasting since the 1970s. The broadcasting company was sold to Audacy, Inc. on November 17, 2017. Category:American entertainment companies Category:1928 establishments in the United States Category:2017 disestablishments in the United States
title: CBS Radio
